## My Favorite Song of 2017

1.  Sugar for the Pill - Slowdive
2.  Bet She Looks Like You - Nick Hakim
3.  Mythological Beauty - Big Thief
4.  Thinking of a Place - The War on Drugs
5.  Driver - John Andrews & The Yawns
6.  Baybee - Jay Som
7.  Continental Breakfast - Courtney Barnett, Kurt Vile
8.  Saturnz Barz - Gorillaz feat Popcaan
9.  Shark Smile - Big Thief
10. Die Young - Sylvan Esso
